title: Why my League Client such a Potato
body: Ok. I know i got a Potato Laptop to play League with but i got no issue with my Fps in game beside my internet sometime gone shitty. But man the League client is sooo Potato pissing me off sometime, first my Client sometime gone unresponsive when i open website and im always delay or sometime black screen  when i join the game room dosent bother me in rank but fking piss me off when i want to play normal so im always last pick which is support. Btw my laptop is working fine on Dota client and WOW, only gone Potato on the shitty league Client
